title: [♕] Best Moments of Avicus 2014 [❤]

replies.body: The herd.
replies.body_tagged: The herd.

replies.body: Best moments? Well there's been way to much from joining the Forums to becoming Mod. I've met some fantastic people and have had wonderful experiences. Although the best will have to be everything about Cacal <3 (Too much to name :P)
replies.body_tagged: Best moments? Well there's been way to much from joining the Forums to becoming Mod. I've met some fantastic people and have had wonderful experiences. Although the best will have to be everything about Cacal <3 (Too much to name :P)

replies.body: Being Promoted to Director. That was cool.
replies.body_tagged: Being Promoted to Director. That was cool.

replies.body:
There was a ton of "best moments" for me this year.

- Joining the Avicus Network.
-Meeting and playing with the staff and players.
-Becoming a regular on the forums and later, the server.
-Meeting the noodle-eating Director in-game and becoming great friends with him.
-And more that I can't remember!

There are two things that really stick out for me though.
When I first joined, I set a goal for myself.
I told myself that I wanted to become well known, help others and have a good reputation to everyone.

I think I have reached this goal which is amazing for me personally.
I am well known, and am "liked" by players and staff alike.
I am very thankful for that.


The second thing was that when the server was being attacked, I was chosen to temporarily become a Jr.Moderator to help watch over the server as some of the other staff tended to the server offline.

I am still to this day extremely grateful that the staff picked and trusted me with the position. There are so many worthy players and to be issued with this Big role took a lot of trust.
I understand this and cannot be more grateful.

This year I have learnt a lot from this server.
I have also made some extraordinary friends which is amazing!
I also never thought I'd have such a healthy and "close?" relationship with the staff and the community, it's so very awesome.



So thanks for an awesome year guys!
I am very grateful.

I also never thought I'd have such a healthy and "close?" relationship with the staff and the community, it's so very awesome.



So thanks for an awesome year guys!
I am very grateful.

replies.body:
Frosted's List of Favourite Memories From 2014

1. I used just be an absolute no one on Avicus, then I met a lot of people and I'm so grateful for that. It all started with The Squaddd, even though we were close we drifted apart. But I'll remember the memories that we shared there forever.

2. Meeting new people in Teamspeak, to be honest I used to be horrified of the people in Teamspeak, but now that I've spoken to them a lot I see that there's nothing to be scared of. And I'm so grateful that I was able to snap myself out of a trance and meet some of the nicest and funniest people I know.

3. Meeting someone over the summer.

4. All nighters in the summer, I remember when I would stay up till around 4 in the morning talking to someone bahahha. But that was fun xD And this person should know that I'm talking about them.

Honestly there are so many more memories that I wish I could explain but most of them are inside jokes, its just been amazing to have met so many awesome people throughout the year. I don't know where I would be without you guys :)

replies.body:
Too many to count...

- Sistahood
- Sharkeisha Gang
- Making a tons of maps
- Getting JrMod
- Getting Map Dev
- Creating "Show your face to the world!"
- Managing "Show your face to the world!"
-Teaching a lot of doods how to copy an paste on my server..
- Learning how to make better maps
- Aesthetics Vs Gameplay mayhem

Theres probably a lot more..
but unfortunately...

- The Sistahood was disbanded
- The Sharkeisha Gang was never heard from again (after everything)
- (I still make maps, but less)
- I was demoted
- I was un mapdev'ed
- I deleted the thread.
- I deleted the thread.
- I cancelled my server subscription 
- (still do)
- It's over

All good things must come to an end? .-.

replies.body:
There is a few good moments for me this year on Avicus.

- Going onto Teamspeak
- Getting to know the community *better*
- Playing games with friends and other players
- Becoming a regular forum user and game user.
- More I can't remember!

I've wanted to become a well known nice player, with a good reputation to everyone. I'm thankful for players and staff making this a fun server for me to play on and enjoy.

Thanks everyone for the awesome year! I hope 2015 on Avicus will even be better!

replies.body:
My favorite moment of the year had to be joining Teamspeak back in February and discovering how great it was. As I became more and more confident of my abilities I began to branch out and take my first steps by using my mic. Honestly, choosing to start communicating really brought me closer to everyone on teamspeak. I can still recall the many times I stayed up all night playing and overall having a great time with the "crew." However, the "crew" began to dissolve and sadly many of my great acquaintances left or just stopped coming on Teamspeak.

                 Getting denied from jr. mod was also a somewhat defining experience. Mostly because it still confuses me as to why it took 4 weeks for results. Although it doesn't sound like something I should look to as a "great" moment, it really was a nice slap in the face. (p.s. ~4th to get interviewed, one of the last to get results)
replies.body_tagged:

I can still recall the many times I stayed up all night playing and overall having a great time with the "crew." However, the "crew" began to dissolve and sadly many of my great acquaintances left or just stopped coming on Teamspeak.

                 Getting denied from jr. mod was also a somewhat defining experience. Mostly because it still confuses me as to why it took 4 weeks for results. Although it doesn't sound like something I should look to as a "great" moment, it really was a nice slap in the face. (p.s. ~4th to get interviewed, one of the last to get results)

reply_to.body:
There was a ton of "best moments" for me this year.

- Joining the Avicus Network.
-Meeting and playing with the staff and players.
-Becoming a regular on the forums and later, the server.
-Meeting the noodle-eating Director in-game and becoming great friends with him.
-And more that I can't remember!

There are two things that really stick out for me though.
When I first joined, I set a goal for myself.
I told myself that I wanted to become well known, help others and have a good reputation to everyone.

I think I have reached this goal which is amazing for me personally.
I am well known, and am "liked" by players and staff alike.
I am very thankful for that.


The second thing was that when the server was being attacked, I was chosen to temporarily become a Jr.Moderator to help watch over the server as some of the other staff tended to the server offline.

I am still to this day extremely grateful that the staff picked and trusted me with the position. There are so many worthy players and to be issued with this Big role took a lot of trust.
I understand this and cannot be more grateful.

This year I have learnt a lot from this server.
I have also made some extraordinary friends which is amazing!
I also never thought I'd have such a healthy and "close?" relationship with the staff and the community, it's so very awesome.



So thanks for an awesome year guys!
I am very grateful.

So thanks for an awesome year guys!
I am very grateful.

replies.body:
It begins.

Coming on TS for the first time.
Getting reported for slavery a ton of times.
Reading inappropriate things on a constant basis in TS.
Being a randy.
Debating politics with Gonzo.
DJing in Skype groups.
Learning to PvP and Killfarming with Emerald <3<3<3<3
Becoming decent at PvP.
Sunrise busting my ears out daily.
Flirting with chicks.
Being SpicyTunaRoll's wingman.
SpicyTunaRoll being my wingman.
Reading stuff from the Deep Web aloud on TS.
Getting perm banned from TS multiple times.
Making friends with my enemies.
Making enemies with my friends.
Staying up until 3AM looking at 4chan with Glitchy. 
Marrying Glitchy <3<3<3<3
Debating with Fluenza.
Building Maps with Merlin.
Dealing with Jimmy and the Minorities.
Becoming somewhat known in the community.
Getting Jr Mod.
Getting demoted from Jr Mod.
Getting Mod 2 days after.
Being the sketchiest staff member.
Watching Naydurr and Lance get Admin.
Proximity.
fin 4 now will update confirmed

replies.body:
And I'll do it, all the way from January.

-Reaching 1st Prestige
-Getting yelled at from many people in TS
-Yoav thinking I hack, and almost getting banned
-Meeting people like Pand, Tino and Emerald, and playing with them consistently
-Reaching 2nd Prestige
-Oblivion II
-Teaching some regulars how to killfarm and whatnot :^)
-Reaching 3rd Prestige
-Meeting Dooz 3<
-Getting 255 Kills in 1 life
-Reaching 4th Prestige
-Racing with Fazer & Gonzo for the first non-donor to reach 5th prestige
-Leaving Oblivion II and watching it crumble ;-;
-Meeting Sunrise, Mooch 3<
-Hitting 5th Prestige and earned my 30,000th kill at the same time
-Getting my OF Cape from Killerbye <3
-Making a staff app in 30 minutes (DONT DO IT I JUST GOT LUCKY)
-Avicore Testing
-UltraBubbles winning emerald rank and giving it to me <3<3<3<3
-Be one of the first players to prestige in Nexus
-Getting Junior Mod.
-Joining Apex
-Moderating with Mooch, and ItzDylan for hours on end.
-All 3 of us getting promoted on the same day
-Meeting people like Sulorak, Refuse, Lil_Greg,and Tel
-Almost retiring MANY times :c
-Rip in Apex
-Applying for Senior Moderator
-Having people calm me down before my interview
-Getting promoted to Senior Moderator
-Hitting 10th Prestige
-Making Maps with Merlin, Sulorak, Emmy and Greg
-Video calling with Sulorak at like 3 AM on 4chan
-And lastly, Everything to come in 2015, and I hope that everything works out in the end for everyone
